name: The Jonas Paradox
description:
[ Made in about 4 hours total for Wowie 2.0 Game Jam (allegedly) ]

What do you think? Don't make assumptions. It won't be handed to you. Dig deep.

Self-disclose the truth you weren't looking for. Read between the line spacing. There's so much to see that isn't visible.

This is the glorified Powerpoint Presentation that begins your initiation.

[ Brought to you under duress by Beard or Die ]

shh.

Credits: LeanGUI
